document_data.mainbody:
The Hard Way was an adventuring company in the late 15 century DR.
*Grackle, a rogue.
*Kildar, a wizard.
*Colin, a fighter.
*Estus, a cleric.
200px|thumb|"Adventurers of the Month" plaque in Inn Plain Sight with the sketches of the Hard Ways members after they managed to steal Cinderhowls egg.
